items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holiday Party Here I Come...
items.body: I hardly ever do clothing reviews as people dont take into account their own body differences BUT this dress is amazing. I dont have time to go try on dresses as I travel a lot for work. So Amazon here I am! This dress is well made and normal heaviness for sequins and beads. Size is exact measurements. I ordered a size bigger just in case but ended up returning and getting my exact size and it fits perfect. No complaints. It has low to medium stretch. Just enough and is comfortable to wear. I look forward to this masquerade Holiday Party. Thanks for offering this beautiful dress..... Read more
items.author: Nicole M Dunomes

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesomely flattering
items.body: I purchased the BluePlum Plus Size Formal Dress in a 2X and it was the perfect fit. I originally ordered a larger size but returned it, once I matched the size to my bust measurement, the 2X was spot-on. The quality was truly value for the money: the stitching was clean, no threads hanging; the sequins stayed in place with zero shedding, and the dress flowed flawlessly. I didnâ€™t wear a control garment (I couldâ€™ve), but it still looked great (I thoughtðŸ™‚). The blue with glitter was absolutely striking, and I received tons of compliments. I highly recommend this dress 100% - just be sure to measure your bust for the right size. Read more
items.author: Grateful nurse

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous!
items.body: Beautiful dress and very comfortable. I wore this dress to a company Christmas party and received so many compliments. Iâ€™m 5â€™4â€ and normally wear a size 16, but I sized up to a 18 because I wanted the dress to fit a little looser, and it was perfect. I wore 4-inch heels with it, and the dress barely touched the floor, so I was able to walk around without it dragging. Definitely worth the money. The detailed design helps draw attention away from problem areas and creates a really flattering look. Read more
items.author: Bargain Tiff

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Order 1 to 2 sizes above for the perfect fit.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just Gorgeous
items.body: This is absolutely gorgeous dress. Only issues sequins stick to the gown tulle on outside. Got many compliments. The sizing is true to size. This dress was perfect length as well. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great find for a formal evening!

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for chic night on our cruise
items.body: I wore this dress on a recent cruise and got many compliments on it. Nice quality and packed well. If you donâ€™t like your upper arms, this is a good dress for you. The stomach area is more form fitting than I usually wear, but shapewear made me feel more confident in it. Read more
items.author: Leanne

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Gray, Forest Green, Burgundy, Olive Green, Black, Champagne, Teal Blue, Dusty Blue, Navy Blue, Rust Red, Black & Gold. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
